entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers and flurries beginning late in the morning then changing to flurries early in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
